property.name: Text
property.value: Your deck can have up to 1 extra Star of cards. Each of your Firecons has Bold 1 and Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Omega Supreme (Base), Transport City Defender has Brave and becomes Sturdy. When you combine into Captain Omega Supreme, Transport City Defender -> Flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: This stratagem now applies to your Captain Omega Supreme, Transport City Defender. The first time your Captain Omega Supreme, Transport City Defender battles each turn -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters get +2 ATK until end of turn. If it has an Armor, it also gets Bold 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1, Tough 1. When you put this on a character that has 11 Stars or more -> Your opponent scraps a card from their hand. Then, your opponent chooses one of their Upgrades and scraps it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> The defender gets +1 DEF until end of battle for each different color among battle icons you flip this battle, up to +4 DEF.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move 1 damage from each of your Seekers to an enemy. If you have a Melee character on the battlefield -> Scrap an enemy Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1, Pierce 1. When the upgraded character attacks, if it is a Wrecker -> It gets +1 ATK until end of turn. When the upgraded character attacks, if it is a Leader -> It gets +1 ATK until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may do 1 damage to one of your Wreckers -> If you do, return a face-down enemy Secret Action to its owner's hand. If you have a Specialist on the battlefield -> Your opponent scraps a card from their hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to a character -> It gets +2 ATK until end of turn. Then, if a Specialist was damaged this way, its owner draws a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Leaders gets +3 ATK until end of turn. If you have a Ranged character on the battlefield -> Do 1 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: This is a Leader if you began the game with no Autobots on your starting team. Tough 1. When you flip to this mode -> If this has an Armor, look at your opponent's hand. Then, you may play a Secret Action.

property.name: Text
property.value: This is a Leader if you began the game with no Autobots on your starting team. Bold 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 2. When you flip to this mode -> Return an Upgrade on a character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Focus 1. Each character with the highest number of Stars on your team has +1 DEF.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1, Tough 1. At the start of your turn -> You may do 1 damage to one of your Wreckers. If you do, do 2 damage to an enemy that has at least 10 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your damaged Wreckers has Bold 1 and Pierce 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your deck can have up to 3 extra Stars of differently named cards with one or fewer battle icons. When you flip to this mode -> Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put all cards with exactly 1 Star revealed this way into your hand and scrap the rest.

property.name: Text
property.value: This gets +1 ATK for each character in a player's KO area. Bold 1, Focus 1. After you flip battle cards for this character's attack and before the defense flips -> You may play one of your flipped cards with exactly 1 Star.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your deck can have up to 1 extra Star of cards for each other Insecticon on your starting team. When you flip to this mode -> Scrap an Upgrade from this. For each battle icon on the Upgrade scrapped this way, your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> Flip 1 more battle card for each Insecticon on your starting team.

property.name: Text
property.value: This gets +1 DEF for each Boat on your starting team. When you flip to this mode -> Draw 2 cards. Then, scrap a card from your hand unless your starting team was only Boats.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 2. Each character with the highest number of Stars on your team has +1 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Your opponent reveals a card at random from their hand. If it has two or more battle icons, scrap it. Otherwise, each of your Decepticons gets +1 ATK until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Focus 1. When this attacks and your opponent has 1 or fewer cards in hand -> This gets +2 ATK until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sturdy, Tough 1. Other characters can't be repaired. Damage counters can't be moved from enemies to other characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your opponent draws 1 or more cards, if they've already drawn a card this turn -> Your opponent scraps a card from their hand. When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy -> Use this card's Bounty ability. Bounty -> Choose Weapon, Armor, or Utility. Return all enemy Upgrades of the chosen type on the battlefield to their owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put each card revealed that has no battle icons into your hand. Scrap the rest. For each card scrapped, one of your Planes or Seekers gets Bold 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. Then, Plan 1. When one of your Seekers attacks and you flip at least one card with no battle icons -> Do 1 damage to each non-Seeker character.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have no other Cars on the battlefield -> This has Bold 2. When you flip to this mode -> Scrap the top card of your deck. Then, you may do 1 damage to one of your Wreckers to play that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is your only character on the battlefield -> He has +3 ATK and +1 DEF.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add an Upgrade revealed this way to your hand and scrap the rest.
